title: PS5 Storage Solution Inbound?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.26.21
description:
Greg and Bless talk about the rumor that we're FINALLY getting extra storage on PS5, open-world Pokemon, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:20 - Housekeeping
Our Pokemon Direct reactions are up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
Did you know that Kinda Funny Best Friend Belinda Garcia wrote her first video game?! Stonefly was announced today, Belinda worked on it, and you should check it out at twitter.com/stoneflygame. It’s from Flight School -- Creature in the Well and Island Time VR devs -- and it’s sick as hell.
Wild Aces take on the Zipper tomorrow! Coverage starts at 4:30 p.m. PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:07:41 - Expandable PS5 Storage Coming this Summer
00:16:26 - PlayStation’s Japan Studio is being re-organized
00:22:42 - “Does legacy really not mean anything anymore in a gaming industry that seems to be pushing more towards pleasing Western and European audiences?” - Nathan Choquette
00:31:06 - “Do you think that we will get a version of Astro that is more game focused and less tech demo-y?” - TheSheepWhisper
00:34:35 - Ads
00:39:07 - Dragon Age is ONLY single-player
00:42:39 - EA Cancelled Gaia
00:53:27 - State of Play Recap
00:55:19 - “I have a PlayStation conundrum I want your opinion on…” - luciddre4m
00:58:03 - Pokemon Presents Recap
01:01:27 - Out today 
01:04:46 - You‘re Wrong
01:07:00 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Greg and Gary
Wednesday: Tim and Andy
Thursday: Greg and Xcast’s Parris Lilly
Friday: Blessing and GameSpot’s Michael Higham
